This is a bug reported by Francine Grimmer:
I am trying to display DDL in the SQL Editor frame from the DataSource Explorer. I have written my own SQLEditorStorageEditorInput that generates the DDL and calls the setStorage with the text and setConnectionInfo with the connection profile. Then I have my own ObjectActionDelegate that has a run method that does the page.openEditor and provides the input text. The DDL is displayed but I am getting the following Null Pointer exception: Error occurred while trying to install sql updater java.lang.NullPointerException at org.eclipse.datatools.sqltools.sqleditor.internal.editor.SQLUpdater.rememberAnnotations(SQLUpdater.java:358) at
Detailed information can be found at http://www.eclipse.org/newsportal/article.php?id=459&group=eclipse.dtp#459

Fixed. Added SQLStorageDocumentProvider and SQLStorageAnnotationModel to sqltools.sqleditor plugin and make SQLRoutineDocumentProvider extends SQLStorageDocumentProvider, so that:
1. Extenders are not forced to depend on routine editor plugin;
2. A SQLStorageAnnotationModel is created for the base SQLEditor.
In addition, the SQLUpdater is modified to check NPE.
